item.title: Why Both Stocks and Gold Are Rising After the U.S. Attack on Venezuela
item.description: American investors are "looking through and past the strike" on Venezuela, focusing instead on earnings, spending and interest rates stateside.

item.title: You May Not Know About This Rule That Could Boost Your Retirement Savings
item.description: Catch-up contributions can lower your tax bill and allow you to save more money for retirement.

item.title: 8 Secrets for a Happy Retirement
item.description: Preparing for retirement isn't just about saving money.

item.title: Your Home Equity Could Be the Secret to Getting Out of Debt
item.description: Americans have a near record amount of home equity â€” and it could be the key to helping them get out of credit card debt.

item.title: When Social Security Recipients Will Get Their Checks in January
item.description: Of note: Millions of Social Security recipients will see their 2026 cost-of-living adjustment, or COLA, show up in payments this month.
